title: improving TH error messages in Apply macros
body_html:
Previously:

RuntimeError: inconsistent tensor size at 
/Users/soumith/code/pytorch/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorCopy.c:86

Now:

RuntimeError: inconsistent tensor size, 
expected tensor [2 x 1 x 16] and src [1 x 9 x 16] to have the same 
number of elements, but got 32 and 144 elements respectively at 
/Users/soumith/code/pytorch/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorCopy.c:86

...and improvements in many other places.

body:
Previously:
```
RuntimeError: inconsistent tensor size at 
/Users/soumith/code/pytorch/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorCopy.c:86
```

Now:

```
RuntimeError: inconsistent tensor size, 
expected tensor [2 x 1 x 16] and src [1 x 9 x 16] to have the same 
number of elements, but got 32 and 144 elements respectively at 
/Users/soumith/code/pytorch/torch/lib/TH/generic/THTensorCopy.c:86
```

...and improvements in many other places.
